title: Shutdown Fullcast 4.46 - Leonard Fournette Remains At Large
description:
Penn State knocked off #2 Ohio State with a blocked field goal returned for a touchdown, so naturally we take 10 minutes to get to that game and talk about LSU-Ole Miss first because we're terrible at identifying meaningfulness. Other points of digression include:
- Whether Todd Graham has what it takes to use "chickenshit" in conversation
- How to defeat Jim Harbaugh by preying on his crippling addiction to competition
- Bill Snyder is not a nice person, don't fall for his kind grandpa thing
- Kirk Ferentz does the job you paid him to do
- Our government mandated statement of fealty to Alabama
- A very rude trip through the Arkansas-LSU box score
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Penn State knocked off #2 Ohio State with a blocked field goal returned for a touchdown, so naturally we take 10 minutes to get to that game and talk about LSU-Ole Miss first because we're terrible at identifying meaningfulness.
